TextView.android:text:
This application calculates the periodic payment for a loan with a fixed rate and a fixed spread.

 Notional is the principal amount of borrowed money.

 Rate. Is the fixed referenced interest in part of a hundred

 Spread. Is the interest added in parts of a hundred to the total rate

 Payment Frequency. Is the number of payments in a year.

 Years. Then number of year for returning the principal amount.
